title: Wanted: Sam Crawford Throwing SGC or PSA 3-4 range
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: Wanted: Sam Crawford Throwing SGC or PSA 3-4 range
posts.post_content:
Hey all,
Trying to knock down a few of the remaining HOFers in the set. I need a  Crawford Throwing. Ideally in a SGC holder, but PSA works. Better backs are always an option, but at this point I’m not picky.

PM if you have one you can spare. I can buy or have plenty of trading stock.

Thanks,
Bob
